name: Hilton Manchester Airport

reviews.title: Nice Airport Hotel
reviews.text: Stayed here using my Hilton Points and its a nice well maintained hilton hotel. Can be quite expensive to stay but its friendly and clean. Walking distance to airport and accross the road from airport railway station. Rooms lovely, large and clean and reception area is very welcoming. Did not eat at hotel so no comment on food. Would stay here again if needed to.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Being with HH and needing to be at the airport early the next day for a weekend break in Florence (at J K Place) we booked the Hilton.
reviews.title: Oh what a night!

likes.disliked: — The extremely noisy aircon - even when off

reviews.text: It is very convenient and does offer long stay parking deals. For 2 nights we parked in the short stay at Terminal 1.
reviews.title: nice hotel, friendly staff

reviews.text: Because of previous noise problems at London Hilton Canary Wharf we had been promised "special" attention and a welcome pack.
reviews.title: Typical airport hotel

reviews.text: The prebooked deluxe room was OK but nothing special and the welcome gift that London had requested was not in our room on check in nor did it appear until I went to the front desk with a copy of their email.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, over priced food and not very efficient staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel using points earned on the Hilton Honors loayalty scheme and actually received an upgraded 'deluxe' room upon check in, although only at a silver level.
reviews.title: Great Functional Airport Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The free transfer was fast and we had no problems on the pick up or drop off at 4am on a Sunday morning!
reviews.title: Nice Hotel but very poor parking experience

likes.disliked: — Rubbish Car Parking system - poor quality pricey restaurant

reviews.text: The check in was fast and the staff polite.
reviews.title: Dull exterior, surprising atmosphere inside

likes.liked: — Clearly a passion for the food and beverage side of the business

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There was a problem when we discovered we could not close the window in the room. After various staff tried to fix this, they established they needed a key, which was not to hand.
reviews.title: modern hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were then swiftly moved to a similar room with no problems.
reviews.title: Outstandingly pleasant airport hotel !!

likes.liked: — Pleasant and helpful staff; top quality refurbishment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had to book at the last minute for an emergency flight and went through Laterooms, getting a rate of £141 for one night, meals excluded. Parking £10 per night extra. The room was big, the bed comfy. Even next to the lifts, the room was quiet. Room service was prompt, as was checking in and out.
reviews.title: Don't rush to book

likes.liked: — £15 charge for internet access, and the room wasn't even wireless

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, we wouldn't rush to book again. No sky channels at all, movies £9 a time, and a glass of wine £7.95! Two main courses, (a spinach currry and a salmon dish) plus a heineken and a 250ml glass of wine came to £45 plus £3.50 room charge. Bathroom only ok - only one face cloth for the two of us, shower included in bath. It was all clean, to be fair. We didn't get breakfast as we were leaving early, but at £18 per head we weren't likely to bother. It sounds mean, but the hotel just wasn't that special to warrant the cost. And bear in mind this was a cheaper rate than the Hilton website.
reviews.title: Not for non smokers!

reviews.text: In terms of position, five minutes walk from terminals 1 and 3, and easy to find from the M56.
reviews.title: top marks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel with 8 days car parking for Saturday 10th May 2008. When booking we requested a non smoking room when we booked some 3 weeks before our stay.
reviews.title: The parking service is best reason to stay here

reviews.text: When we arrived we were told no non smoking rooms were available and we would have to accept a smoking room. The corridor access to our room stank so heavily of stale smoking it made you baulk to walk along it.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel, Above average

likes.liked: — Quick transfer to airport, less than 5 mins
likes.disliked: — Noise in corridors early hours, request a quiet room!!

reviews.text: Stayed here on a Tuesday night while away with work. Checked in around 8:30, was very quick and didnt have to wait. Was in room 417 over looking the car park. Room was an average size, had 2 single beds, nice large flat screen t.v, bathroom was ok, but shower curtain was dirty.
reviews.title: An Average Hilton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had diiner that night, thankfully work were picking up the bill as i spent £30 on dinner, on 2 courses and a drink! I took the safe option and had the Hilton Burger, was nice as usual but for £13.00 not great value for money.
reviews.title: Good airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast the next day was good, a wide selection, but again £17.00 ud have to eat alot to get yuor moneys worth!
reviews.title: Good location
Back to basics needed
reviews.text: To sum up i wasnt that impressed with the Hilton, didnt have the usual nice Hilton touches, and staff were average.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Id stay again if someone else was paying, but if i was, i think i would try an alternative.
reviews.title: Excellent Value for money

description: Coveniently situated only 5 minutes from Manchester International Airport terminals and 8 miles (15 minutes by train) to Manchester City Centre, this modern hotel is home to Mason's Restaurant& Bar.
